thread.title: Singer Julio Iglesias calls Donald Trump 'a clown'
thread.title_full: Singer Julio Iglesias calls Donald Trump 'a clown'

title: Singer Julio Iglesias calls Donald Trump 'a clown'
text:
> Top News Singer Julio Iglesias calls Donald Trump 'a clown' FILE - In this Sept. 23, 2015, file photo, Spain's singer Julio Iglesias acknowledges the media during a press conference promoting his album "Mexico" in Mexico City. Iglesias called Donald Trump a clown during an interview published Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2105, in the Spanish newspaper La Vanguardia, and vowed not to sing again in his casinos. (AP Photo/Christian Palma, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
